original_text: The people put God's Covenant Box on a new cart. They took it out of Abinadab's house. Uzzah and Ahio were leading the cart.
korean_text: 하나님의 궤를 새 수레에 싣고 아비나답의 집에서 나오는데 웃사와 아히오는 수레를 몰며

sentences.original_text: The people put God's Covenant Box on a new cart
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 하나님의 언약 궤를 새 수레에 실었다

sentences.original_text: They took it out of Abinadab's house
Uzzah and Ahio were leading the cart
